steps.title: Enemy at the Gate - Get Heavy Strike
steps.description: Get Heavy Strike reward from quest completion

reward.name: Heavy Strike
reward.usage_notes: Starter skill. Swap to Sunder ASAP when available.

steps.gear_focus: Look for 2-handed weapon upgrade from vendor

steps.title: Mercy Mission - Get Chance to Bleed
steps.description: Get Chance to Bleed support reward

reward.name: Chance to Bleed
reward.usage_notes: Support skill for physical builds. Adds bleed damage over time.

steps.title: The Caged Brute - Get Leap Slam

reward.name: Leap Slam
reward.usage_notes: Primary movement skill. Use with red-socketed weapon for mobility.

steps.gear_focus: Look for 2-handed axe or mace upgrade

steps.title: The Siren's Cadence - Get Sunder
steps.description: Get Sunder and transition to main skill

reward.name: Sunder
reward.usage_notes: Main Skill. Excellent AoE for clearing and good single target.

steps.gear_focus: Focus on high physical damage 2-handed weapons
steps.currency_notes: Save for upcoming support gem purchases

steps.title: Sharp and Cruel - Get Melee Physical Damage
steps.description: Get Melee Physical Damage support gem

reward.name: Melee Physical Damage
reward.usage_notes: Core support for physical melee builds. MORE physical damage.

steps.gear_focus: Continue looking for high physical damage weapons
steps.currency_notes: Save currency for upcoming aura purchases

steps.title: Intruders in Black - Get Herald of Ash

reward.name: Herald of Ash
reward.usage_notes: Fire damage aura. Adds flat fire damage and overkill explosions.

steps.gear_focus: Look for life and resistance gear

reward.name: Determination
reward.usage_notes: Key defensive aura. Essential for physical damage reduction.

vendor.name: Pride
vendor.usage_notes: Physical damage aura. Swap between Determination (clearing) and Pride (bosses).

steps.title: Sever the Right Hand - Get Boneshatter

reward.name: Boneshatter
reward.usage_notes: Can replace Sunder for single target. Higher damage but requires trauma management.

vendor.name: Impale Support
vendor.usage_notes: Damage support for pure physical builds. Stacks impale for MORE damage.

steps.gear_focus: Upgrade to higher tier axe base

steps.title: The Eternal Nightmare - Get Rage Support
steps.description: Get Rage Support for movement and damage

reward.name: Rage Support
reward.usage_notes: Great support for Leap Slam or main attack. Builds rage for damage and speed.

vendor.name: Ruthless Support
vendor.usage_notes: Every third attack deals significantly more damage.

steps.gear_focus: Focus on high physical damage and attack speed
